definition: to flatten/to smooth down/to unwrinkle/(fig.) to soothe (emotional wounds)/to heal (scars)
to release (tension)/relief (from suspense)/to dispel (usu. with negative, unable to forget)
see 百孔千瘡|百孔千疮[bai3 kong3 qian1 chuang1]
correct/normal/to be on good terms with/on the right track/right
in the end/after all is said and done
